channel.title: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Basics
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrrates, wrrrit'n are not fer us as yer can see! Also be awarrre some stuff may not work in this trrranslat'n. Like see'n Merrrmaids, do'n math or chemistrrry and stuff. Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about an' th' core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Rambl'n
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrrates, wrrrit'n are not fer us as yer can see! Also be awarrre some stuff may not work in this trrranslat'n. Like see'n Merrrmaids, do'n math or chemistrrry and stuff. Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrrates, wrrrit'n are not fer us as yer can see! Also be awarrre some stuff may not work in this trrranslat'n. Like see'n Merrrmaids, do'n math or chemistrrry and stuff. Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown fer its simple rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesnâ€™t support well. Ye could use pure HTML t' expand possibilities. But this happens t' be a bad idea.
